camera_gear.model: Hasselblad X2D 100C or Phase One IQ4 150MP
camera_gear.lens: Rodemstock HR 23mm tilt-shift or Schneider Kreuznach 28mm PC TS lens with 12mm shift
camera_gear.sensor: Medium format 100MP+ CMOS with 15 stops dynamic range
camera_gear.shutter_speed: 1/8s for traffic light trails, bracketed 1/60s to 4s for HDR exposure blending
camera_gear.aperture: f/11-f/16 for optimal hyperfocal distance and starburst effects on point light sources

lighting_setup.time_of_day: Golden Hour (Late Sunset), sun angle very low
lighting_setup.lighting_direction: Direct, horizontal low highlight deep amber sunset light(#E69E46) hits the front facade, while the foreground is blocked from direct light
lighting_setup.quality: Extreme contrast: Soft warm direct light on the building vs. deep, blue ambient light in the foreground vs dark blue sky
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Mixed color temperature: 2700K sodium vapor street lighting, 4000K LED building illumination, 5600K neutral signage backlights

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Warm white glow visible through glass glazing, selective floor illumination in lobby areas, backlit elevator cores
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Front facade bathed in soft amber sunlight, glass reflecting the warm sun, creating a 'golden tower' effect

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Foreground submerged in gray-blue shadows(#2F4F4F), skylight reflections
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Trees in the foreground are in silhouette or cool shadow, contrasting with the bright warm building

color_grading.palette: Strong Warm/Cool contrast: The highlight reflection area of the building is light gold (# FAD7A0), the core light receiving surface is amber gold (# E69E46), and the warm transition area is a reddish caramel color (# A65832) vs. Gray-Blue/Slate foreground shadows (#2F4F4F)
color_grading.saturation: Medium saturation in the golden sunlit areas, desaturated cool tones in the shadows
color_grading.contrast: High contrast ratio, emphasizing the separation between the lit subject and the shadowed environment

texture_quality.details: High-frequency details in glass mullions resolving the golden reflections
texture_quality.ground_surface: Foreground in shadow, appearing matte and cool blue-grey, reflecting only the zenith sky, White lane line
texture_quality.foliage_style: Dark, shadowed masses of urban planting in the foreground, framing the lit architecture

atmosphere.mood: Dramatic isolation, the building stands out as a beacon of light
atmosphere.feeling: Solitary contemplation, the last light of day highlighting the monumentality of the architecture against the darkening city

technical_quality.post_processing: Multi-exposure HDR blending to handle the extreme dynamic range between sunlit facade and shadowed foreground
technical_quality.white_balance: Daylight balanced (5500K) to render the sunset warm and the shadows naturally cool/blue
technical_quality.tone: S-curve with deep shadows, keeping the foreground dark to guide the eye to the bright building
technical_quality.vignette: Organic asymmetric vignette, heavier at the bottom to push focus upwards to the light
technical_quality.dynamic_range: Maximized recovery, ensuring the golden highlights don't clip while retaining just enough texture in the deep blue shadows
